alert.note: Alert for Appling; Brantley; Inland Glynn; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 8:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GLYNN... NORTHEASTERN PIERCE...NORTHEASTERN BRANTLEY...WAYNE AND SOUTHEASTERN APPLING COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM EDT... At 848 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gardi, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jesup, Gardi, Screven, Everett, Doctortown, Mount Pleasant, Hortense, and Broadhurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Brantley; Inland Glynn; Pierce; Wayne
